Monthly Creative Technology Meetups in Huddersfield

HOME ARCHIVE

Thursday 5th October 2023

17.30 – 19.30

Free entry, drinks and snacks provided, come meet other artists/creatives/technologists in a friendly, casual environment.

This month’s meetup will include a presentation and discussion with artist and developer Charlotte Roe about the topic of her MA by Research project – ‘Sound Artist as Critical-Technical User’. Roe will discuss her ideas for developing a sound art practice around process exposition, data sonification, and technology ‘mis-use’.

Where?

Dai 大 Hall (The Piazza, Unit 29/30, Victoria Lane, Huddersfield HD1 2QF)
